mutants.code:
def reverse_list(input_list):
    left = 1
    right = len(input_list) - 1
    while left < right:
        (input_list[left], input_list[right]) = (input_list[right], input_list[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return input_list

def reverse_list(input_list):
    left = -1
    right = len(input_list) - 1
    while left < right:
        (input_list[left], input_list[right]) = (input_list[right], input_list[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return input_list
